DOC.brief_summary: We investigate whether treatment central sleep apnea-hypopnea bilevel positive airway pressure ( BiPAP ) patient idiopathic dilate cardiomyopathy ( IDCM ) would improve LV function .
DOC.brief_title: BiPAP Cardiomyopathy With Central Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic dilate cardiomyopathy history alcohol abuse , diabetes mellitus , endocrine disorder , hypertension , obstructive sleep apnea syndrome , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
